parts.text: {"language": "English", "text": "[Visual: Speaker questions who is more likely to poop themselves, leading to a discussion and denial of a 'poop bucket' incident.] : Who is more likely to poop themselves? {"language": "English", "text": "[Visual: In the podcast intro, the hosts discussed if they ever upset someone, then a man shared a dark humor joke about hooking up with a girl's dead mom.] [Visual: A woman and a man sit in chairs and speak into mics at the Botez Sisters podcast.] : Have you ever really seriously upset someone in one of your videos? : Yes. : So there was this girl, I was like, \"Hey, if I hooked up with your mom, who would you hook up with to get back at me?\" And she said, \"Joke's on you, my mom's dead.\" Oh no. [Visual: Continuing the dark humor joke, the man escalated the joke with more details about the mom, and the girl walked off the set.] : And I said, \"Joke's on you, I'm going to go deeper in you than you buried her.\" Oh And then she was laughing, she's like, \"I like dark humor.\" She's like, \"Joke's on you, my mom was cremated.\" And I said, \"Joke's on you, I put her in my Keurig and drank her.\" Then she walked off set.", "max_char": 200}
{"description": "I can\u2019t believe he said this\u2026", "hashtags": ["zachjustice", "botez", "podcast", "botezsisters"]}

[Visual: The woman asks the man to pick her up, while they both question the seriousness of the date.] [Visual: The screen is split, with a man in a baseball cap visible at the top and a woman holding a microphone at the bottom, in front of a classroom-like setting.] : All right. : Pick me up.
